content:
Hello
I have implemented zulip in my company. today it has 1200 users. Many users have noticed inhibition in private messages. there is no such inhibition in common channels. I would be grateful for any help
I'm not clear what you mean by "inhibition." Can you show a screenshot of the behaviour you mean?

there is a delay when typing in private messages.
there is also a delay when searching for a user. when switching between users, there may be a delay of up to 10 seconds

@КартавыйМолдаванин can you check /var/log/zulip/tornado.log for whether your Tornado process is near 100% load?

(Also, what version are you running?)
